title: A New Biden Answer for Unfulfilled Promises
sub_head: After a disappointing press conference, the president tries out a new explanation in a message to Democrats.
body:
Deciphering the true meaning of a Joe Biden comment is never easy. But in a Thursday video conference with Democrats, the president appeared to be road-testing a new explanation for his unfulfilled promises: They weren’t really promises!
The need for a new explanation was clear after Wednesday’s White House press conference. A Journal editorial summarized Mr. Biden’s appraisal of his first year in office in response to questions from reporters:
